page.title: 12Services/Employment:Gringley
page.content: {Father Baker:}vicar since 1962;joined C.of E.in 1959;Rural Dean responsible for co-ordinating Ranskill,Misterton, Everton,Scrooby,West Stockwith, Harworth,Bawtry,Misson,Austerfield, Mattersy,Clayworth,Finningley,& Gringley. {Ellicar Farm,Gringley Carrs:}11 cattle 1 Simmental bull,30 hens,some ducks,2 cats;tractor,loading shovel,plough, sprayer,fertiliser spreader;4 barns storing animal fodder for a national company;crops:oil seed rape,wheat, barley (no root crops);farmer has farmed for 30yrs (12yrs in Gringley) & has approx.70 acres (28.4 hectares). {Milk Lady:}delivers milk,cream,butter, pop(minerals),yoghurt,eggs & fruit juice to around 125 people;milk produced by Northern Dairies;she sells c.3360 pints (1920 litres) per week; works 6:30-10:30am;had job for 5 yrs.
